bosses.name: Asylum Demon
bosses.description: A massive demon guarding the exit of the Undead Asylum.

bosses.name: Bell Gargoyles
bosses.description: Twin gargoyles protecting the bell of awakening.

bosses.name: Capra Demon
bosses.description: A goat-headed demon wielding two machetes.

bosses.name: Ceaseless Discharge
bosses.description: A massive lava creature guarding the ruins.

bosses.name: Centipede Demon
bosses.description: A grotesque demon with the appearance of a giant centipede.

bosses.name: Chaos Witch Quelaag
bosses.description: A half-woman, half-spider pyromancer.

bosses.name: Crossbreed Priscilla
bosses.description: A hybrid of dragon and human with a deadly scythe.

bosses.name: Dark Sun Gwyndolin
bosses.description: The Dark Sun deity guarding Anor Londo's illusions.

bosses.name: Demon Firesage
bosses.description: A demon imbued with fire, a larger version of the Asylum Demon.

bosses.name: Four Kings
bosses.description: Dark specters ruling the Abyss.

bosses.name: Gaping Dragon
bosses.description: A grotesque dragon with a gaping maw.

bosses.name: Great Grey Wolf Sif
bosses.description: A loyal wolf, guardian of the grave of Artorias.

bosses.name: Gwyn, Lord of Cinder
bosses.description: The Lord of Cinder, once the leader of the gods.

bosses.name: Iron Golem
bosses.description: A giant iron warrior guarding Sen's Fortress.

bosses.name: Moonlight Butterfly
bosses.description: A magical butterfly that fires sorcery attacks.

bosses.name: Nito
bosses.description: The first of the dead, ruler of the Catacombs.

bosses.name: Ornstein & Smough
bosses.description: A deadly duo guarding Princess Gwynevere.

bosses.name: Pinwheel
bosses.description: A strange creature wearing a mask, master of necromancy.

bosses.name: Seath the Scaleless
bosses.description: The treacherous dragon who betrayed his own race.

bosses.name: Stray Demon
bosses.description: A stronger version of the Asylum Demon.

bosses.name: Taurus Demon
bosses.description: A colossal demon wielding a huge axe.

bosses.name: Bed of Chaos
bosses.description: The origin of all demons, a chaotic fire entity.

bosses.name: Artorias the Abysswalker
bosses.description: A legendary knight who fell into the Abyss.

bosses.name: Kalameet the Black Dragon
bosses.description: A powerful ancient dragon untouched by time.

bosses.name: Manus, Father of the Abyss
bosses.description: The primordial man consumed by darkness.

bosses.name: Sanctuary Guardian
bosses.description: A fierce chimera protecting the Sanctuary of Oolacile.

bosses.name: The Last Giant
bosses.description: A colossal giant whose body is in a constant state of decay.

bosses.name: The Pursuer
bosses.description: A relentless knight who hunts the player through the lands.

bosses.name: Executioner's Chariot
bosses.description: A massive chariot driven by the dead, with a deadly rider.

bosses.name: The Skeleton Lords
bosses.description: A trio of powerful skeletons controlling a horde of undead.

bosses.name: Flexile Sentry
bosses.description: A twisted, dual-headed creature guarding the passage.

bosses.name: Lost Sinner
bosses.description: A dark figure imprisoned for her sins.

bosses.name: Belfry Gargoyles
bosses.description: A group of gargoyles protecting the Belfry.

bosses.name: Ruin Sentinel
bosses.description: Sentinel-like protectors, defending the ruined areas.

bosses.name: Royal Rat Vanguard
bosses.description: A pack of giant rats led by a royal leader.

bosses.name: Royal Rat Authority
bosses.description: The leader of the Royal Rats, a massive rat with authority.

bosses.name: Scorpioness Najka
bosses.description: A half-scorpion sorceress guarding the ruins.

bosses.name: Mytha, the Baneful Queen
bosses.description: A cursed queen controlling the poisonous area.

bosses.name: The Rotten
bosses.description: A decayed giant corrupted by the abyss.

bosses.name: Old Dragonslayer
bosses.description: An ancient knight who fought dragons in the past.

bosses.name: Covetous Demon
bosses.description: A grotesque, greedy demon that devours souls.

bosses.name: Smelter Demon
bosses.description: A demon forged in molten metal.

bosses.name: Old Iron King
bosses.description: A powerful, ancient king who rules over molten iron.

bosses.name: Guardian Dragon
bosses.description: A fearsome dragon protecting the final area of Drangleic.

bosses.name: Demon of Song
bosses.description: A creature that lures victims with its siren-like voice.

bosses.name: Velstadt, the Royal Aegis
bosses.description: A knight who served the King of Drangleic.

bosses.name: Vendrick
bosses.description: The fallen king of Drangleic, now a hollowed shell.

bosses.name: Darklurker
bosses.description: A mysterious being of the dark, dwelling in the Abyss.

bosses.name: Dragonrider
bosses.description: A knight who rides atop a dragon, guarding the castle.

bosses.name: Twin Dragonrider
bosses.description: Two dragonriders working together to defeat invaders.

bosses.name: Prowling Magus and Congregation
bosses.description: A group of sorcerers attacking the player in waves.

bosses.name: Giant Lord
bosses.description: The giant ruler of an ancient kingdom.

bosses.name: Ancient Dragon
bosses.description: An ancient dragon that resides at the peak of the world.

bosses.name: Throne Watcher and Throne Defender
bosses.description: A duo protecting the throne of Drangleic.

bosses.name: Nashandra
bosses.description: The queen of the Abyss, seeking to bring about the end of the world.

bosses.name: Aldia, Scholar of the First Sin
bosses.description: The scholar of the First Sin, who seeks to rewrite the world.

bosses.name: Elana, Squalid Queen
bosses.description: A queen who commands the Abyss, filled with dark sorcery.

bosses.name: Sinh, the Slumbering Dragon
bosses.description: A slumbering dragon of ancient power.

bosses.name: Graverobber Varg, and Cerah
bosses.description: A duo of grave robbers protecting a dark area.

bosses.name: Smelter Demon
bosses.description: A second encounter with the deadly Smelter Demon.

bosses.name: Fume Knight
bosses.description: A knight who wears a massive suit of armor, wielding the power of fume.
bosses.location: The Crown of the Old Iron King

bosses.name: Sir Alonne
bosses.description: A legendary knight who wields a powerful sword.
bosses.location: The Crown of the Old Iron King

bosses.name: Iudex Gundyr
bosses.description: A knight who guards the path to the Firelink Shrine, known for his fierce combat style.

bosses.name: Vordt of the Boreal Valley
bosses.description: A massive beast who guards the entrance to the Boreal Valley.

bosses.name: Curse-Rotted Greatwood
bosses.description: A massive tree infected by a curse, its hollowed form filled with danger.

bosses.name: Crystal Sage
bosses.description: A sorcerer who controls the crystal magic, capable of splitting into multiple clones.

bosses.name: Abyss Watchers
bosses.description: A group of knights, bound by their oath to protect the world from the Abyss.

bosses.name: Deacons of the Deep
bosses.description: A group of clerics, corrupted by the deep and its sinister forces.

bosses.name: High Lord Wolnir
bosses.description: A fallen king whose body is surrounded by cursed chains, his power lingering in the darkness.

bosses.name: Old Demon King
bosses.description: A massive demon whose flames scorch everything in its path.

bosses.name: Pontiff Sulyvahn
bosses.description: A powerful sorcerer and ruler, who manipulates both magic and flame.

bosses.name: Yhorm the Giant
bosses.description: A colossal giant, once a great ruler, now an abomination of the past.

bosses.name: Aldrich, Devourer of Gods
bosses.description: A gluttonous entity who devours both gods and mortals, wielding powerful sorcery.

bosses.name: Dancer of the Boreal Valley
bosses.description: A graceful yet deadly warrior, cursed by the abyss and serving as a protector.

bosses.name: Dragonslayer Armour
bosses.description: An animated suit of armor, containing the spirit of a long-forgotten warrior.

bosses.name: Oceiros, the Consumed King
bosses.description: A king who sought immortality and was consumed by his desire.

bosses.name: Champion Gundyr
bosses.description: A more powerful version of Iudex Gundyr, now as a true champion of combat.

bosses.name: Lothric, Younger Prince
bosses.description: The younger prince, who dreams of becoming a powerful ruler in the kingdom.

bosses.name: Ancient Wyvern
bosses.description: A dragon-like creature that has lived for centuries, guarding the land from invaders.

bosses.name: Nameless King
bosses.description: A mighty god-like king, once a companion of the dragons, now a fearsome force of nature.

bosses.name: Soul of Cinder
bosses.description: The final boss of the Firelink Shrine, the embodiment of all the ashes and souls accumulated over time.

comments.comment: Pretty easy if you know the tricks.
Annoying when the second one joins in!
That small arena makes this fight way harder than it should be.
If you know the cheese, it's easy. Otherwise, it's tough.
Lava everywhere! Hard to find a good spot to fight.
The lava makes it extra tricky, but a fun fight!
You don't HAVE to fight her, but if you do... be ready!
Coolest aesthetic but super annoying mechanics.
Basically Asylum Demon, but with more fire. Not too bad.
If you don't burst them down fast, they overwhelm you.
Massive but slow. Stay behind it!
The saddest boss fight in the game.
Parrying makes this fight much easier.
If you knock him down, it's over!
Easiest fight if you have ranged attacks.
Skeletons everywhere! Bring a divine weapon.
One of the hardest fights in the game.
Super easy boss, but creepy design.
Crystals everywhere! Don't let him curse you.
Just an upgraded Asylum Demon. Not too bad.
This boss is intimidating at first, but once you learn to dodge, it's not too bad.
One of the most frustrating bosses due to the floor collapsing.
Best boss fight in the series! Artorias is an absolute legend.
Kalameet is a beast! That tail attack is deadly.
Manus is pure aggression, but a very fun challenge.
Sanctuary Guardian is a nice warm-up for the DLC bosses.
The Last Giant is kind of sad when you think about his backstory.
Fighting him multiple times gets tiring, but still a cool boss.
Unique concept for a boss fight, but can be frustrating.
A bit underwhelming, but the skeleton horde is fun.
A tough fight with two heads, but the fight is manageable if you focus on one head at a time.
A very challenging fight with a tragic backstory.
These gargoyles are hard to handle in groups. Take them one at a time.
The sentinels' movements are predictable, but their numbers can overwhelm you.
A funny and strange fight, but the rat pack can be a pain to deal with.
The Royal Rat Authority can be tough, especially if you get overwhelmed by the other rats.
A beautiful but dangerous fight. Watch out for her poison attacks.
Mytha's poison attacks are no joke. Prepare to heal often.
The Rotten is a massive challenge. Be prepared for a long fight.
An old dragon slayer who knows how to fight. Great challenge!
A grotesque boss that takes a while to defeat. Watch out for his heavy attacks.
The Smelter Demon is tough but predictable. Stay patient and learn his moves.
Old Iron King is slow but hits hard. Take advantage of his slow attacks.
Guardian Dragon is a great challenge, especially with its fire breath. Keep your distance.
Demon of Song is a bit tricky because of its voice. Stay agile to avoid damage.
Velstadt, the Royal Aegis, is a formidable knight. His sword is dangerous, but his slow speed helps.
Vendrick is extremely tough. Be prepared for a long battle and use magic for distance.
Darklurker is tricky, but once you figure out his movements, he's manageable.
Dragonrider is one of the easier bosses. Avoiding his dragon's attack is the key.
The Twin Dragonriders are tough to handle, but taking them down one at a time works.
The Magus and his congregation can overwhelm you quickly, but with the right timing, you can take them down.
Giant Lord is a force to be reckoned with, but his slow movements make him predictable.
Ancient Dragon requires patience. Watch out for its fire breath and strong attacks.
This duo is a tough challenge, but breaking their coordination is key.
Nashandra is a terrifying boss, especially with her dark magic. Make sure to keep your distance.
Aldia is tricky, using a mix of sorcery and strategy. Patience and focus are your best weapons.
Elana's sorcery can overwhelm you, but if you stay focused, you can defeat her.
Sinh is slow, but his fiery attacks are devastating. Be cautious and stay mobile.
Varg and Cerah are tricky, but they fall fast if you focus on one at a time.
Facing the Smelter Demon again is a tough challenge, but with experience, it's manageable.
The Fume Knight is relentless and unforgiving. His attacks hit hard, but with patience, you can find openings.
Sir Alonne is one of the toughest knights you'll face. His sword skills are impeccable, and his agility is unmatched.
Iudex Gundyr is an intimidating boss, but if you focus on dodging and counterattacking, you can beat him.
Vordt is a massive beast with a devastating charge attack. Keep your distance and wait for the right moment to strike.
Curse-Rotted Greatwood is slow but dangerous. Watch out for the sap and the creatures that spawn around it.
The Crystal Sage is all about confusion. Take out the clones first, and then focus on the real one.
Abyss Watchers is an intense battle, especially when they transform into a single powerful foe. Be prepared for a tough fight.
Deacons of the Deep rely on their numbers. Focus on taking out the main cleric, and the others will fall.
High Lord Wolnir is tough, especially with his cursed chains. Attack him when the chains are active for more damage.
Old Demon King is a force to be reckoned with. His flame attacks are deadly, but his slow movements leave you openings.
Pontiff Sulyvahn can be a tough fight due to his magic and sword attacks. Stay patient and watch his patterns.
Yhorm the Giant might seem intimidating, but the Storm Ruler weapon is your key to victory. Don't hesitate to use it.
Aldrich, Devourer of Gods, has a lot of ranged attacks. Make sure to dodge often and wait for openings to attack.
The Dancer of the Boreal Valley is graceful but deadly. Keep your distance and learn her moves to strike when she's vulnerable.
The Dragonslayer Armour is slow but powerful. Watch out for his wide-reaching attacks and punish him when he's open.
Oceiros, the Consumed King, uses fast and unpredictable attacks. Stick close and learn his moves to dodge and retaliate.
Champion Gundyr is tough, but you can overcome him with patience. Dodge his powerful attacks and wait for the right moment to strike.
Lothric, Younger Prince, is a tricky boss with many combos. Keep your guard up and watch for opportunities to strike when he's vulnerable.
The Ancient Wyvern is a unique fight. Watch out for its deadly fire attacks and use the environment to your advantage to stay safe.
Dragonslayer Armour can be a nightmare if you don't watch out for his sweeping attacks. Stay behind him when possible.
A truly epic battle, where the Soul of Cinder's many forms keep you on your toes. Be prepared for a long fight and watch out for his fiery attacks. Patience is key.
Probando PUT actualizar
Probando POST en Postman
